languages.text: "Ваша предшественница заключила с нами официальный союз. Она выделила нам штаб на Даргонусе и неоднократно поддерживала в вопросах сбора и охраны {g|Encyclopedia:TitheGlossary}десятины{/g}. Мы, в свою очередь, оказывали Леди Теодоре помощь в вершении закона на подвластных ей мирах".

"Your predecessor made a formal alliance with us. She provided us with a headquarters on Dargonus and supported us in the collection and guarding of the {g|Encyclopedia:TitheGlossary}Imperial Tithe{/g} on several occasions. We, in turn, assisted Lady Theodora in enforcing the law on the worlds under her control."
languages.original_text: "Ваша предшественница заключила с нами официальный союз. Она выделила нам штаб на Даргонусе и неоднократно поддерживала в вопросах сбора и охраны {g|Encyclopedia:TitheGlossary}десятины{/g}. Мы, в свою очередь, оказывали Леди Теодоре помощь в вершении закона на подвластных ей мирах".

traits.locale_text: "Your predecessor made a formal alliance with us. She provided us with a headquarters on Dargonus and supported us in the collection and guarding of the Imperial Tithe on several occasions. We, in turn, assisted Lady Theodora in enforcing the law on the worlds under her control."

"Your predecessor made a formal alliance with us. She provided us with a headquarters on Dargonus and supported us in the collection and guarding of the Imperial Tithe on several occasions. We, in turn, assisted Lady Theodora in enforcing the law on the worlds under her control."

"Your predecessor made a formal alliance with us. She provided us with a headquarters on Dargonus and supported us in the collection and guarding of the Imperial Tithe on several occasions. We, in turn, assisted Lady Theodora in enforcing the law on the worlds under her control."

"Your predecessor made a formal alliance with us. She provided us with a headquarters on Dargonus and supported us in the collection and guarding of the {g|Encyclopedia:TitheGlossary}Imperial Tithe{/g} on several occasions. We, in turn, assisted Lady Theodora in enforcing the law on the worlds under her control."

languages.text: «Su predecesora estableció una alianza formal con nosotros. Nos proporcionó una base en Dargonus y nos apoyó en la recolección y protección del {g|Encyclopedia:TitheGlossary}Diezmo Imperial{/g} en diversas ocasiones. A cambio, nosotros ayudamos a lady Theodora a defender la ley en los mundos bajo su control».
languages.original_text: "Your predecessor made a formal alliance with us. She provided us with a headquarters on Dargonus and supported us in the collection and guarding of the {g|Encyclopedia:TitheGlossary}Imperial Tithe{/g} on several occasions. We, in turn, assisted Lady Theodora in enforcing the law on the worlds under her control."

traits.locale_text: «Su predecesora estableció una alianza formal con nosotros. Nos proporcionó una base en Dargonus y nos apoyó en la recolección y protección del Diezmo Imperial en diversas ocasiones. A cambio, nosotros ayudamos a lady Theodora a defender la ley en los mundos bajo su control».

languages.text: “你的前任行商浪人与我们正式结为盟友。她为我们在达戈努斯提供总部，多次协助我们征收、守护{g|Encyclopedia:TitheGlossary}帝国什一税{/g}，而我们则协助西奥多拉夫人进行执法工作，确保她的王国牢牢掌握在她的控制之下。”
languages.original_text: "Your predecessor made a formal alliance with us. She provided us with a headquarters on Dargonus and supported us in the collection and guarding of the {g|Encyclopedia:TitheGlossary}Imperial Tithe{/g} on several occasions. We, in turn, assisted Lady Theodora in enforcing the law on the worlds under her control."

traits.locale_text: “你的前任行商浪人与我们正式结为盟友。她为我们在达戈努斯提供总部，多次协助我们征收、守护帝国什一税，而我们则协助西奥多拉夫人进行执法工作，确保她的王国牢牢掌握在她的控制之下。”

languages.text: « Votre prédécesseure a scellé une alliance officielle avec notre organisation. Elle nous a fourni des locaux sur Dargonus et nous a soutenus à plusieurs reprises dans la collecte et la protection de la {g|Encyclopedia:TitheGlossary}dîme impériale{/g}. En échange, nous nous sommes engagés à aider dame Théodora à faire appliquer la loi dans les mondes placés sous son autorité. »
languages.original_text: "Your predecessor made a formal alliance with us. She provided us with a headquarters on Dargonus and supported us in the collection and guarding of the {g|Encyclopedia:TitheGlossary}Imperial Tithe{/g} on several occasions. We, in turn, assisted Lady Theodora in enforcing the law on the worlds under her control."

traits.locale_text: « Votre prédécesseure a scellé une alliance officielle avec notre organisation. Elle nous a fourni des locaux sur Dargonus et nous a soutenus à plusieurs reprises dans la collecte et la protection de la dîme impériale. En échange, nous nous sommes engagés à aider dame Théodora à faire appliquer la loi dans les mondes placés sous son autorité. »

languages.text: 「あなたの前任者は、私たちと正式な同盟を結びました。彼女はダルゴナスに本部を提供し、いくつかの場面で{g|Encyclopedia:TitheGlossary}帝国租税{/g}の徴収および保護において支援してくれました。私たちは、その代わりにレディ・シオドーラの統治下にある世界で法を執行するのを支援しました」
languages.original_text: "Your predecessor made a formal alliance with us. She provided us with a headquarters on Dargonus and supported us in the collection and guarding of the {g|Encyclopedia:TitheGlossary}Imperial Tithe{/g} on several occasions. We, in turn, assisted Lady Theodora in enforcing the law on the worlds under her control."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたの前任者は、私たちと正式な同盟を結びました。彼女はダルゴナスに本部を提供し、いくつかの場面で帝国租税の徴収および保護において支援してくれました。私たちは、その代わりにレディ・シオドーラの統治下にある世界で法を執行するのを支援しました」

languages.text: "Selefiniz bizimle resmî olarak ittifak kurdu. Bize Dargonus'ta bir karargâh sağladı, birçok kez {g|Encyclopedia:TitheGlossary}İmparatorluk Aşarı'nın{/g} toplanması ve korunması hususlarında destek oldu. Biz de Leydi Theodora'nın kontrolü altındaki dünyalarda yasaların uygulanmasına yardım ettik."
languages.original_text: "Your predecessor made a formal alliance with us. She provided us with a headquarters on Dargonus and supported us in the collection and guarding of the {g|Encyclopedia:TitheGlossary}Imperial Tithe{/g} on several occasions. We, in turn, assisted Lady Theodora in enforcing the law on the worlds under her control."

traits.locale_text: "Selefiniz bizimle resmî olarak ittifak kurdu. Bize Dargonus'ta bir karargâh sağladı, birçok kez İmparatorluk Aşarı'nın toplanması ve korunması hususlarında destek oldu. Biz de Leydi Theodora'nın kontrolü altındaki dünyalarda yasaların uygulanmasına yardım ettik."

languages.text: "Eure Vorgängerin ist eine formelle Allianz mit uns eingegangen. Sie hat uns ein Hauptquartier auf Dargonus eingerichtet und uns nicht nur einmal bei der Erhebung und Sicherung des {g|Encyclopedia:TitheGlossary}imperialen Zehnts{/g} unterstützt. Im Gegenzug haben wir Lady Theodora geholfen, auf Welten unter ihrer Kontrolle das Gesetz zu vollstrecken."
languages.original_text: "Your predecessor made a formal alliance with us. She provided us with a headquarters on Dargonus and supported us in the collection and guarding of the {g|Encyclopedia:TitheGlossary}Imperial Tithe{/g} on several occasions. We, in turn, assisted Lady Theodora in enforcing the law on the worlds under her control."

traits.locale_text: "Eure Vorgängerin ist eine formelle Allianz mit uns eingegangen. Sie hat uns ein Hauptquartier auf Dargonus eingerichtet und uns nicht nur einmal bei der Erhebung und Sicherung des imperialen Zehnts unterstützt. Im Gegenzug haben wir Lady Theodora geholfen, auf Welten unter ihrer Kontrolle das Gesetz zu vollstrecken."

languages.original_text: "Your predecessor made a formal alliance with us. She provided us with a headquarters on Dargonus and supported us in the collection and guarding of the Imperial Tithe on several occasions. We, in turn, assisted Lady Theodora in enforcing the law on the worlds under her control."
